name: KesslerSyndrome
description:
My attempt at a game jam project! I'm only now discovering that the fully functional game I had in the Unity editor is completely non-functional now. Better luck next time, I guess. I'll be making this one playable for upload after the Jam window. The *systems* are all there, and you can see the barest concept of what we were going for, but everything initializes wrong on the first level.

If you're interested in playing and aren't afraid of jumping through a few hoops, you *can* unstick the game. Use the magnetic tether to attach a piece of debris to the "nose" gun of the ship, then press spacebar to fire it. Destroying a connected object will update all the component tiles of the ship, giving you the fuel and thrust that you're lacking.

Still, the build version has a *lot* of bugs I need to work out that the editor version didn't have.
